page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: The farm is not big enough to have full time employees,so the owner,her husband,her mother father and brother all have other jobs but give time to the farm.In the late spring and summer work is not so hard as the sheep are put out to grass. Even the very young children can help. As the weather gets worse the animals allowed to come to shelter and are fed hay oats and mineral supplements. The hardest time is lambing because a 24 hour watch has to be kept.Last year they lost some lambs. They had been so overworked in the very cold conditions that they missed the 4a.m.shift. Four sets of twins died because they were so small they froze to death.Even so they were able to sell 180 fat lambs at market.
